Articles.Content: Ah yes, your current orbit needs to be a stable orbit around the celestial body. Since you burned from Kerbin orbit straigt into a Duna intercept (right?) you didn't have a stable Sun orbit to begin with.
Are there plans for updating this mod for 0.25 as well? I'm hoping so.
Yes, this will be updated. I don't have plans for new achievements for 0.25 yet, though - give it some time.
Excellent. I'm getting back into KSP, and of course the day I do so, it updates so all my favorite mods are suddenly broken.

Excellent. I'm getting back into KSP, and of course the day I do so, it updates so all my favorite mods are suddenly broken.

Yeah.. Usually I still play one more week with the older build till all my used mods are updated then I switch to the new build. But my list is almost complete. Only two missing.

I end up skipping versions. All the mods I have are from 0.23. Kinda fell out of it/life happened/etc, then I came back and picked it up again.

I've got 6 mods unaccounted for on my list, with another 4 that "work" but aren't actually updated.

... I have too many mods.
does work in 0.25, however kvc warns its incompatible.

does work in 0.25, however kvc warns its incompatible.

There's also a problem with this mod in Career mode. Achievements tries to add Reputation when you are awarded an achievement, but AddReputation is throwing a 'method not found' error. From what I can see, the method parameters were changed and there are no overloads that takes the parameters being passed to it.

That in itself isn't a problem but it seems to be killing the contract system and preventing it from seeing when a contract's completion parameters are met.
Eek, that's very bad. I'll be providing an update shortly.

Eek, that's very bad. I'll be providing an update shortly.

Yes, do that! Can' wait! Thanks in advance!
I'm still a fan of this mod, hoping to see the .25 fix

I've just posted a thread to announce that I'm looking for a plugin developer to take over this plugin.

Meanwhile, I'm halting all development on this plugin. It's been a good time so far. Thank you all for your input and support.
